title: Save the soil
creator_credit: Division of Motion Pictures Extension Service and Raymond Evans
brief_description: A general discussion on the problem of soil conservation. Various ways in which soil can be conserved and protected are demonstrated, including: terracing; cover-cropping to prevent erosion; crop rotation; use of manures and commercial fertilizers.
